official_title: A resolution electing Robert E. Bauman, of Maryland, as a member of the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs and the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

summary.text: Provides that Robert E. Bauman be elected a member of the following standing committees of the House of Representatives: (1) Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs; and (2) Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

titles.title: A resolution electing Robert E. Bauman, of Maryland, as a member of the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs and the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
